message:
Can you confirm or fix that

1. HubAI, ClaimsAI and walterAI can injest these file types this is when files are uploaded let me know if there's any issues but confirm all free apps 
Word Documents
Pdf files
excel

2. can you review claims AI to do's and how they work and function apply the same working for to do's to Walter if you have any issues let me know but the tattoos on Walter are not working at the moment they need to work exactly the same way as or how claims AI works 

3. since you have now done the to-do's please to a test a complete test on the to-does for Walter with screen grabs both add to do's removed and and change and show working 

4. confirm there is no conflicts with Walter and speech and that no other user has access to another user's records as far as the speech box goes and the conversation in the box with Walter uses will have access to files and normal operations but the speech and text box to remain private for each user there should be no cross contamination review check test this feature 

once you have done all four to a complete HTML report on what was done and if there are any issues I will leave you to it to go on automation if any task has any questions or updates please move on to the next one and let me know in the report as I'm going to bed now I will talk to you in the morning

---
[AGENT MODE: Debug] Use debug-trace approach. Trace data flow, find root causes. Use Explore agents to locate relevant code.
